name: Cheats for: The Sims 3
description:
A complete cheats guide for The Sims 3 and for all of the different platforms including iOS, PS3, Mac and PC and many more. Find and access the cheat your looking for through the well-organized layout.

This app is more than just and regular cheat app, try your skills with the quiz or refine your skills by reading on the fun facts.

This app contains cheats for the following games and platforms:

Sims 3 – PC and Mac, Playstation 3, Xbox and iOS

There is no Internet connection required to use this app.

Disclaimer:
This is an unofficial cheat and strategy app for The Sims 3. This app is not endorsed or affiliated with Electronic Arts or The Sims trademark. The developer does not claim nor have the full right to some of the information in this app, this information is only used to show and convey in the app.
